column1: '''''Olos''''' (variant spelling ''olor'') is [[Quenya]] for "dream, vision / of mind". It is connected to [[Gandalf]]'s Quenya name ''[[Gandalf
In [[Qenya]], ''olor'' also means "dream", with the variant spelling ''olórë'' (used in [[Olórë Mallë]]).<ref>{{LT1
*[[Helge Fauskanger]], ''[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm Quettaparma Quenyallo]'', as of 7 September 2010</small>
